pos_mean_info_list.mean: 恼人地；烦人地；令人不快地（annoying的副词形式）

word_group.brief_definition: 恼人的习惯；烦人的习惯

bilingual.source: The midge is a tiny insect that can be quite annoying.
bilingual.target: 蚋是一种非常烦人的小昆虫。

bilingual.source: She cut off the annoying (讨厌的) noise and rose from her bed.
bilingual.target: 她切断了烦人的噪音，从床上站起来。

bilingual.source: The alarm clock was flashing with the annoying digital zeros.
bilingual.target: 闹钟闪着烦人的数字零。
没错，我就是那个烦人的朋友。
把那件烦人的事忘了吧。

bilingual.source: The 6 Most Annoying Coworkers: Are You One?
bilingual.target: 最烦人的六类同事：你是其中一类吗?。

bilingual.source: Molly : I agree junk mail can be annoying.
bilingual.target: 莫莉：是啊，垃圾邮件是够烦人的。
停止烦人的弹出气泡通知

yingyinNormal.en: Now you're just my annoying friend Chandler.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在你是我烦人的朋友钱德。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you're the doctor, but I am constantly hearing this annoying sound. Me, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是医生我听你的，但确实，老有烦人的声音在我耳边响。没错。

yingyinNormal.en: I know. Can you believe it? One year ago today I was just your annoying friend Chandler.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道。你相信吗？一年前的今天，我还只是烦人的朋友钱德。

yingyinNormal.en: No, you're right. No, there's no plots, no trucks, no feet. So what other annoying habits shall we discuss?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，你是对的，不，不，没有情节，不用卡车，也不用走路，还有什么烦人的习惯要讨论？

yingyinNormal.en: In the meantime, I'd like to go over some proposed changes to the roommate agreement specifically to address Penny's annoying personal habits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 与此同时，我要对室友协议进行一些修订，特别要提出关于佩妮十分烦人的个人习惯。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, it is so annoying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 烦死人了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, you have no idea how annoying this is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你绝对想不到这有多烦人。

yingyinNormal.en: What's German for "annoying"? Nervig. Why do you ask?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那德语的"烦人"怎么说？"恼人"你问这个干嘛？

yingyinNormal.en: What? I'm annoying? You criticize my behavior all the time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？我哪里烦人了？明明是你整天对我的言行意见超多。

yingyinNormal.en: You are so annoying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好烦。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon. Oh, it won't hurt my feelings. Go ahead, Amy, say I'm annoying. I'm annoying.
yingyinNormal.zh: Sheldon。我不会伤心的，说吧，Amy，说我很烦人，我很烦人。

yingyinNormal.en: I know what it is. I've heard it my whole life. The word's "annoying". Go ahead, say it. Say it. Say I'm annoying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道的，我从小到大听惯了，是"烦人"。说吧，说啊，说我很烦人。

yingyinNormal.en: I told him his voice was annoying. He didn't want to listen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我跟他说过他的声音很惹人厌。他就是不听。

yingyinNormal.en: Is it like a little annoying? Or is it like when Phoebe chews her hair?
yingyinNormal.zh: 觉得有点烦吗？感觉就和看到菲比咬她的头发时一样？

yingyinNormal.en: Ginny. She's been talking about you all summer. A bit annoying, really.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是金妮，她整个夏天都在说你。真是烦死人！
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: I keep making mistakes like that. I'm awful. Oh, you're not. And annoying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一直在犯这种错，真是太糟糕了。噢，不是啦。也很讨人厌。

yingyinNormal.en: So I have a flaw. Big deal. Like Joey's constant knuckle-cracking isn't annoying?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有缺点不行吗？了不起吗？乔伊常扳指关节就不惹人厌？

yingyinNormal.en: Hi, fellas. Oh, where's your annoying little friend who thinks he speaks mandarin?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们，好那个自以为会说普通话的人没来？

yingyinNormal.en: You know what? Screw you, Sheldon. You are the most annoying person I have ever met.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，滚你丫的，你是我这辈子见过最烦的人了。

yingyinNormal.en: She was this annoying little know-it-all who totally got on my nerves. Yeah, I get it. Oh, shh!
yingyinNormal.zh: 她是个讨人厌的"百事通"，老把我惹毛。是，我知道。别说话！

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使恼怒的; 使生气的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Among the <highlight>annoying</highlight> challenges facing the middle class is one that will probably go unmentioned in the next presidential campaign.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中产阶级面临的恼人挑战之一，而这个问题在下届总统竞选很可能被忽略。

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: With the bone finally removed from her lung, the woman is very happy that she no longer suffers from that <highlight>annoying</highlight> cough.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 骨头终于从她的肺中取出，这个女人很高兴，她终于不用忍受那种烦人的咳嗽了。

examination_example.sentence: The most <highlight>annoying</highlight> ones for café owners must surely be those usually only two of them who occupy a table for six.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于咖啡馆老板来说，最令人恼火的肯定是两个人占用了一张六人桌。

examination_example.sentence: What is most <highlight>annoying</highlight> for café owners according to the woman?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据这位女士所言，咖啡馆老板最讨厌的是什么？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: She cut off the <highlight>annoying</highlight> (讨厌的) noise and rose from her bed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她切断了烦人的噪音，从床上站起来。

examination_example.sentence: The dark spots are really <highlight>annoying</highlight>, but they are very small.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些黑斑真的很烦人，但它们非常小。
